abstract: Options that control the behavior of Look Around views.

# CommonLookAroundOptions

**Interface**

Options that control the behavior of Look Around views.

## Declaration

```swift
interface CommonLookAroundOptions
```

## Controlling Look Around behavior

- **isNavigationEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether someone can navigate inside the Look Around view.
- **isScrollEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether someone can scroll the Look Around view.
- **isZoomEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether someone can scroll the Look Around view.
- **openDialog**: A Boolean value that indicates whether someone can scroll the Look Around view.
- **padding**: The values that define content padding within the Look Around view frame.
- **showsPointsOfInterest**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Look Around view display points of interest (POIs).
- **showsRoadLabels**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Look Around view display road labels.

## Exploring at street level

- **LookAround**: A view that allows someone to see a street level view of a place.
- **LookAroundOptions**: Options for initializing a LookAround view.
- **LookAroundPreview**: A class that renders a preview of a Look Around view.
- **LookAroundPreviewOptions**: Options for initializing a LookAroundPreview object.
- **LookAroundScene**: Object that represents the current location of the view.
- **AbstractLookAround**: An abstract class that provides a common interface for Look Around views.
- **lookAroundViews**: A list of all the Look Around objects that are currently active on a page.

## Inherited By

- LookAroundOptions
- LookAroundPreviewOptions
